name: Seriously Asian: Amaranth Greens
description: Amaranth greens, streaked through with shades of red and purple, are fresh and cheap at Asian markets right now. Like snow pea shoots, amaranth greens are one of my favorite vegetables to stir-fry: Slightly astringent when raw, the greens turn soft and mellow as they cook down.
recipeIngredient: 1 large bunch amaranth greens, about 6 to 8 ounces

recipeInstructions.text: Cut the amaranth greens into 2-inch segments, preserving the natural shape of the leaves whenever possible. For the thicker stalks, cut the stalks into 1/2 inch lengths.
